patthana16.93:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.93:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.93:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
